channel.title: Behind Brian the Build Bunny
channel.description: Since posting about Brian the Build Bunny, I have been getting a steady stream of emails from people who would like to know more about how it works. Team Foundation Server provides a mechanism by which you can subscribe...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Luis Fraile+00:00
item.description: Nice hehehe, we musty do something with builds and Multidomo ;)
item.dc:creator: Luis Fraile

item.title: Comment by Mac Noland+00:00
item.description: This is great Martin! If my manager's manager's manager, can approve the spending request, we might give this a shot! If we do, I'll let you know how it goes.
item.dc:creator: Mac Noland

item.title: Comment by oo+00:00
item.description: Cool, though you can't trust the bunny. My own rabbit is not reliable at all and hangs at least twice a day. But its good fun anyway, even when I have to reset it every few hours or so.
item.dc:creator: oo

item.title: Comment by Howard van Rooijen+00:00
item.description: Hehe, actually the orginal motivation for my "Team Foundation Server Notification Event project template" project was to get my nabaztag working via TFS! Awesome project.
item.dc:creator: Howard van Rooijen

item.title: Comment by Christian Jacob+00:00
item.description: We are using Team Build for only a couple of days now. After having read about Brian, I got myself a Nabaztag, too. And now guess what... company policies prevent me from getting it connected to the internet... *sigh*
item.dc:creator: Christian Jacob
